Articles.Content:
hi, after playing for a while (like 6 flight or so) i only have 1 flight in progress

i can not exit the mission control building when entering, nor can i launch a vessel, just nothing happens when clicking any buttn of the new ksp UI, also not the back to main menu, but settings do work, very odd

it only happens in my actual save file (i a new game it works)

and I also cannot find any logs in any folder of the game. where are they hidden those days?

mods is installed (not so many):

best regards
